version_name: 8.67 One of the Biggest Clash Updates - Ever!• Town Hall 11
8.67 One of the Biggest Clash Updates - Ever!• Town Hall 11

version_description:
A brand new Clash world to build and battle in!
• Build a completely new base: the Builder Base!
• Defend with Crusher, Multi Mortar, Push Trap
• Troops with abilities - Sneaky Archer, Cannon Cart
• VS Battle mode, Gem Mine - a whole new Clash!

A brand new Clash world to build and battle in!
• Build a completely new base: the Builder Base!
• Defend with Crusher, Multi Mortar, Push Trap
• Troops with abilities - Sneaky Archer, Cannon Cart
• VS Battle mode, Gem Mine - a whole new Clash!

Home Village Upgrade Blitz
• Upgrade Cannon, Archer Tower and Inferno Tower
• Level up P.E.K.K.A, Healer, Wizard, Miner and Wall Breaker
• Discounts and balancing, including new Town Hall 10 levels

Builder Base Level Up
• Get Builder Hall level 6 and new upgrades for EVERYTHING!
• Bring out the Bats with the new Night Witch!
• Burn foes to a crisp with the new Roaster defense!

9.105.9
小问题修复和游戏优化

9.105
家乡升级闪击战
• 升级加农炮、箭塔、地狱之塔
• 升级皮卡超人、天使、法师、掘地矿工和炸弹人
• 优惠活动和平衡性调整，10级大本营新增单位等级

建筑大师基地升级
• 建筑大师基地大本营可升至6级，所有项目可升至新的等级！
• 使用全新的暗夜女巫召唤蝙蝠！
• 让全新的熔岩火炮把敌军烤成脆饼！

Clans, friends and clan friends
• Challenge your clanmates to friendly battles in the Builder Base
• Work with your clan to unlock new Clan Perk levels and gain access to tiered Clan Badges
• See the online status of your friends
• Watch friends' attacks live in both the Home Village and Builder Base

New building and troop levels
• New troop levels to Golem and Valkyrie
• New building levels to Air Sweeper and Bomb Tower
• 25 more maximum level wall pieces

Clans, friends and clan friends

• Work with your clan to unlock new Clan Perk levels and gain access to tiered Clan Badges
• See the online status of your friends
• Watch friends' attacks live in both the Home Village and Builder Base

New building and troop levels
• New troop levels to Golem and Valkyrie
• New building levels to Air Sweeper and Bomb Tower
• 25 more maximum level wall pieces

It's time for Clash's frightful night!
• Special obstacles are spawning
• 1-Gem Spell brewing boost
• Celebrate Halloween Clash-style with the Pumpkin Barbarian and Giant Skeleton

Removed the Halloween theme
Removed the Halloween theme
Removed the Halloween theme
Removed the Halloween theme

December update is here!

Clan Games
• Get your clan together and prepare to do your collective best in the Clan Games! Complete Challenges together with your clanmates and climb through the reward tiers all the way to the top to earn resources, gems and Magic Items!

Magic Items
• Powerful items with magic properties have appeared! Magic items have wonderful powers that range from helping you with upgrades to boosting various things in your village and army. The treasury in the Clan Castle has been modified to store them safely!

Other Changes and Additions
• Housing Space: added a new Army Camp level to Townhall 11, bringing up maximum possible housing space up to 260
• Hero levels: Barbarian King and Archer Queen can now both be leveled up to 50
• Greatly improved mod detection and prevention
• Lots of balance changes, including making low level Golems more powerful and reducing X-Bow damage per second on lower levels.

December update is here!

Clan Games
• Get your clan together and prepare to do your collective best in the Clan Games! Complete Challenges together with your clanmates and climb through the reward tiers all the way to the top to earn resources, gems and Magic Items!

Magic Items
• Powerful items with magic properties have appeared! Magic items have wonderful powers that range from helping you with upgrades to boosting various things in your village and army. The treasury in the Clan Castle has been modified to store them safely!

Other Changes and Additions
• Housing Space: added a new Army Camp level to Townhall 11, bringing up maximum possible housing space up to 260
• Hero levels: Barbarian King and Archer Queen can now both be leveled up to 50
• Greatly improved mod detection and prevention
• Lots of balance changes, including making low level Golems more powerful and reducing X-Bow damage per second on lower levels.

The spring update is here!
• Builder Hall 8 has arrived along with new deadly weapons, the Mega Tesla and the Super P.E.K.K.A!
• A mystical Trader with a daily selection of magical goods has arrived in the Home Village
• The update also includes new Magic Items, new Clan Games Challenges and much more!

Happy 4th anniversary of Clan Wars!
• Introducing War Tools: A new way to coordinate Clan War attacks. Add strategy notes on enemy bases and tag your targets!
• Many bug fixes and UI tweaks

It's time to find Clans for Clashers and Clashers for Clans!
• Players now get improved clan recommendations and can make use of labels to filter them!
• Clans now get recommendations for players that would be a good fit for the clan!
• Clan Games and Season Challenges have awesome new features and improvements!
• New exclusive Halloween troop, quality of life changes and more!
Various minor bug fixes and improvements

It's time to find Clans for Clashers and Clashers for Clans!
• Players now get improved clan recommendations and can make use of labels to filter them!
• Clans now get recommendations for players that would be a good fit for the clan!
• Clan Games and Season Challenges have awesome new features and improvements!
• New exclusive Halloween troop, quality of life changes and more!
Various minor bug fixes and improvements

Greater Challenges Bring Greater Rewards!
• Introducing Season Challenges: a new game mode with incredible prizes!
• Earn a new exclusive Hero Skin each month by finishing Season Challenges with Gold Pass!
• Upgrade faster with drastically reduced upgrade times and costs for Buildings, Troops, and Spells.
• That's not all!  We're introducing 30v30 War Leagues, balance changes, new Troop levels, and a ton of Quality of Life improvements!

The summer update is here!
• Builder Hall 9 has arrived along with Lava Launcher, Hog Glider and the ability to get an additional Builder!
• Introducing a new more competitive Legend League!
• New Practice Mode for brushing up on attacking skills, new Home Village content and much more

• That's not all!  We're introducing 30v30 War Leagues, balance changes, new Troop levels, and a ton of Quality of Life improvements!

The Lunar Festival is here!
• There's a new festive loading screen!
Removed Winter Theme

Final Update of the Year!
• New Troop: Ice Golem! This chill guy slows down enemy defenses and freezes them solid when he gets destroyed!
• New Spell: Bat Spell! Overwhelm enemy defenses with a cloud of angry bats!
• New Siege Machine: Stone Slammer! A flying fortress that drops big rocks on enemy defenses to clear a way for your army!
• New Magic Items: A magic shovel that lets you move obstacles and a potion that temporarily gives your heroes +5 levels!
• A whole lot of fixes, tweaks and quality of life improvements!

It's time to find Clans for Clashers and Clashers for Clans!
• Players now get improved clan recommendations and can make use of labels to filter them!
• Clans now get recommendations for players that would be a good fit for the clan!
• Clan Games and Season Challenges have awesome new features and improvements!
• New exclusive Halloween troop, quality of life changes and more!

The biggest update of the year has hit like a snowstorm and it’s a flurry of new content!

Town Hall 13
• A brand new “Dark Elixir Ice”-themed Town Hall for players to upgrade that unlocks all-new content, including a new signature defense.
• The Giga Inferno is a fiery new defense that protects the Town Hall and packs quite the explosive punch when destroyed.

Introducing: Royal Champion
• The newest Hero to join Clash of Clans since 2015!
• The Royal Champion is a fearless warrior whose Seeking Shield ability will see enemy defenses crumble around her.

New Troop: Yeti
• The furry-ous fists of the fuzzy Yeti may look cuddly yet they pack quite the punch. But don’t underestimate his Yetimite buddies he carries with him.
• Yetimites are mysterious companion creatures that spawn when the Yeti marches into battle.

New Defense: The Scattershot
• Funny name. Devastating against attackers, with its shotgun-like projectiles that scatter on impact.

New Siege Machine: The Siege Barracks
• This new Siege Machine crams a few extra surprises that pop out when you attack your enemy’s village.

And much, much more!
• New Troop levels
• New Defense levels
• Quality of Life improvements
• And more!

The spring update is here!
• Power up your regular troops into village-wrecking Super Troops from Town Hall 11 onwards!
• Get exactly the troops and spells you asked for with the improved reinforcement requests!
• The update also introduces instant training in Builder Base, new practice levels and much more!"

Summer update has arrived with loads of awesome additions!

• Update also includes fresh Town Hall 13 content and much, much more!

2020 is no year for an ordinary Clashmas - the Logmas Update is here!
● Roll through enemy villages with the Log Launcher, a brand-new Siege Machine!
● Introducing Super Wizard and Ice Hound, the latest additions to the Super Troop line-up!
● Update also contains a new, must-see Spell, fresh Town Hall 13 content, neat quality of life changes and much more!
